summary: Not saying that the whole cast didn’t feel just as depressed as everyone did when the show ended, but you best believe that if...
body: Not saying that the whole cast didn’t feel just as depressed as everyone did when the show ended, but you best believe that if Maxence and Axel weren’t physically together that day— they called each other maybe shed a tear or a thousand on the phone while reminiscing.

reblog.comment: Not saying that the whole cast didn’t feel just as depressed as everyone did when the show ended, but you best believe that if Maxence and Axel weren’t physically together that day— they called each other maybe shed a tear or a thousand on the phone while reminiscing.

trail.content_raw: Not saying that the whole cast didn’t feel just as depressed as everyone did when the show ended, but you best believe that if Maxence and Axel weren’t physically together that day— they called each other maybe shed a tear or a thousand on the phone while reminiscing.
trail.content: Not saying that the whole cast didn’t feel just as depressed as everyone did when the show ended, but you best believe that if Maxence and Axel weren’t physically together that day— they called each other maybe shed a tear or a thousand on the phone while reminiscing.

summary: Yeah i think season 1 work for me because 1) i already love this characters and 2) I haven't watched season 1 og in a long time...
question: Yeah i think season 1 work for me because 1) i already love this characters and 2) I haven't watched season 1 og in a long time so you can count it like refreshing. Season 2 i did not like, but there is a few moments that i gonna rewatch hehe mostly with mika, lucas and girls. And i can't stress this enough how much all my baby girls and baby boys have changed!
answer: Yessss I mean we are attached now to them as their own characters ! And yes I want to see how much they’ve changed! I might even see s2 cause I haven’t yet just like, skip all the Marles lol (that’s gonna be fast….)

reblog.comment: Yessss I mean we are attached now to them as their own characters ! And yes I want to see how much they’ve changed! I might even see s2 cause I haven’t yet just like, skip all the Marles lol (that’s gonna be fast….)

summary: I'm watching season 1 of skam france and i like it? It's shock for me LMAO because i didn't finish druck and it's not bad? And...
question: I'm watching season 1 of skam france and i like it? It's shock for me LMAO because i didn't finish druck and it's not bad? And manon still truly cared for imane...*sigh* lucas babey it's hilarious lmao he r e a l l y lost and jealous and only look at Yann. And he talk with emma. But i didn't see yet his snakeness. I don't like yann and emma it seems like she already has more chemistry with Alex really. Gonna rewatch season 3 after this lmao. I like the pace and characters ain't bad except Charle
answer: Ahhh anon you’re making me want to rewatch s1 - I need to already for meta reasons but yeah. Watched it once after it came out and I was disappointed bc it was the first remake I watched and it was just so similar except less good but I didn’t care about the characters back them I think rewatching now would be very different. And also, like you I did finish the season so I think it wasn’t that bad. I mean it was samey and uninspired at times, and like you said Emma and Yann had like no chemistry ; but I actually liked Emma as main, as well as the girl squad. So yeah gonna try and go back at some point also omg I wanna see babey snake Lucas !!!!

And also, like you I did finish the season so I think it wasn’t that bad. I mean it was samey and uninspired at times, and like you said Emma and Yann had like no chemistry ; but I actually liked Emma as main, as well as the girl squad. So yeah gonna try and go back at some point also omg I wanna see babey snake Lucas !!!!

And also, like you I did finish the season so I think it wasn’t that bad. I mean it was samey and uninspired at times, and like you said Emma and Yann had like no chemistry ; but I actually liked Emma as main, as well as the girl squad. So yeah gonna try and go back at some point also omg I wanna see babey snake Lucas !!!!

title: the best of me
description:
by hylander

“If anything bad happens I flush the rings, I leave my bestman spot to Baz, and I fly back to Paris.”

OR. Eliott and Lucas have never worked up the courage to actually make a move, and thus spent years dancing around each other without ever acknowledging their feelings. However, an engagement party gone a little too wild, an hotel room and a very bad idea might be all it takes to make everything blow up.

summary: So you and sammywinchestersgreatestsin just made me even more desperate for an Eliott-season and I didn't even think that was...
question: So you and sammywinchestersgreatestsin just made me even more desperate for an Eliott-season and I didn't even think that was possible. We wouldn't only see more of Eliott individually and Elu, we'd see more of Eliott/Idriss as well. *grabby hands* GIMME!!

summary: Okay but even worst, Idriss is the one who filmed Eliott's video about Polaris. Can you imagine happy he will be for him when...
question: Okay but even worst, Idriss is the one who filmed Eliott's video about Polaris. Can you imagine happy he will be for him when Eliott will tell him Lucas recreated it for their first kiss? Yann will start having help planning their wedding
answer: right!! eliott will be on the verge of tears telling him about it and idriss won’t stop smiling and saying “no way”, and will also say “no wonder why did a get along with lucas right away he’s such a great guy and i’m so happy that you met him and that you met each other”. and true idriss and yann will get along soon enough too ahah can you imagine eliott and lucas saying them in five years “we’re going to get married!!!” and they will be like “finally!! first things first let us tell you what plans do we have about your wedding it’s going to be epic!!”
